containerDefinitions.name: postgres-client
command: psql "$DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -c "UPDATE \"drivers\" SET \"premium_tourism_status\"='inactive' WHERE \"premium_tourism_status\" IS NULL; ALTER TABLE \"drivers\" ALTER COLUMN \"premium_tourism_status\" SET DEFAULT 'inactive'; ALTER TABLE \"drivers\" ALTER COLUMN \"premium_tourism_status\" SET NOT NULL;" && psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c '\d "drivers"' | grep premium_tourism_status
